scripts.start: truffle migrate --network bscTestnet --reset && truffle run verify ARI Presale --network bscTestnet
scripts.start2: truffle migrate --network rinkeby --reset && truffle run verify ARI Presale --network rinkeby
scripts.start1: truffle migrate --network ropsten --reset && truffle run verify ARI Presale --network ropsten
scripts.startEthMainnet: truffle migrate --network mainnet --reset && truffle run verify ARI Presale --network mainnet
scripts.startBscTestnet: truffle migrate --network bscTestnet --reset && truffle run verify ARI Presale --network bscTestnet
